author: cyber_hokie
content: Is there any meaningful research going on around database migrations between client dbs? For example, a tool to migrate dbs from OpenEthereum to Geth would be really helpful given the current rollback of OE stable requiring a re-sync

author: Deleted User
content: I think OpenEthereum is providing (or going to provide) a migration program

author: Deleted User
content: as far as I know, they are testing it right now

author: Deleted User
content: but the answer to your question is basically "no"

author: __lithp__
content: I have a script which can read a Geth / Parity database and turn it into a format Trinity/py-evm understands

author: __lithp__
content: But I don't think there's anything which solves the general case
